Thanks for visiting our 2019 Home Show Nigeria (Co-located with Lagos International Trade Fair), hoping you had a great time there!

 

Welcome To Join Our Online Exhibitions!

 

In response to the influence and challenges caused by COVID-19, we manage to organize a series of Online Exhibitions, including 2020 Zhejiang Export Online Fair (Nigeria-Beauty). Each Exhibition lasts 5 days with 5 hours of online virtual "Face to Face" business discussion each day because of jet lag (Jun. 3-7, from 10:00 to 15:00).

 

With the support and sponsorship of Chinese Government, we have selected 60 high-quality fabric suppliers from Zhejiang Province. Joining in our online fair, you can enjoy Online Registration, Match-Making, 3D Products Display, make reservations for Online Meeting Rooms and Virtual Business Talking at home. You only need to equip yourself with a laptop (with Camera) or a mobile phone (with Camera) and Stable Internet!

 

For the specific agenda and registration manual please refer to the attachment!

 

Now register with your fingertip and start your “Face to Face” Business Talking at home from here!

 

 

 

Thank you for placing your trust in us.

Wishing you a prosperous business online, stay healthy and take care of yourself!
